feed.title: Blue Iris Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(api): Migrate from gorilla/mux to fiber by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/521
  • feat(alerting): Add GitLab alerting provider by @hlidotbe in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/485
  • feat(alerting): Add token authorization for ntfy by @OskarCarl in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/512
  • feat(ui): Show number of failing checks per group by @quibusus in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/493
  • fix(alerting): use same email subject for trigger and resolution alert by @skhokhlov in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/465
  • fix(alerting): Unable to set maintenance interval to all day by @skhokhlov in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/475
  • fix(ui): disable hover effects when not supported by @macmoritz in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/514
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/miekg/dns from 1.1.53 to 1.1.54 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/462
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/471
  • chore(deps): bump codecov/codecov-action from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/478
  • chore(deps): bump modernc.org/sqlite from 1.20.4 to 1.22.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/479
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.7.0 to 0.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/491
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/coreos/go-oidc/v3 from 3.5.0 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/498
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/TwiN/whois from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/499
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/image from 0.0.0-20210628002857-a66eb6448b8d to 0.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/500
  • chore(deps): bump modernc.org/sqlite from 1.22.1 to 1.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/501
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/prometheus-community/pro-bing from 0.1.0 to 0.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/502
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.9.0 to 0.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/513
  • chore(deps): bump modernc.org/sqlite from 1.23.0 to 1.23.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/516
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/TwiN/whois from 1.1.1 to 1.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/518
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.14.0 to 1.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/519
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/TwiN/whois from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/523
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/valyala/fasthttp from 1.47.0 to 1.48.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/524
  • docs: Specify that exposing Gatus through a subpath is not supported by @ansilh in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/507
  • docs: Fix typo by @sebbbastien in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/494

New Contributors

  • @skhokhlov made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/465
  • @hlidotbe made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/485
  • @sebbbastien made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/494
  • @ansilh made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/507
  • @OskarCarl made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/512
  • @quibusus made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/493
  • @macmoritz made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/514

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.4.0...v5.5.0

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(tls): Pass certificate and private key files to listener method by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/531

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.5.0...v5.5.1

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(ssh): Add support for SSH endpoint by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/473
  • feat(websocket): support monitoring WebSocket endpoints by @heitorPB in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/511
  • fix(alerting): correct success threshold for telegram by @plantatorbob in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/551
  • fix(alerting): Set correct email subject to resolved alert by @lolgopher in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/572
  • fix(tls): Honor client.insecure when doing TLS checks by @vax-r in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/547
  • fix(websocket): handle error by @heitorPB in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/550
  • fix(watchdog): Close dangling file descriptors on shutdown and config reload by @vax-r in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/544
  • docs: demonstrate use of environment variables in config by @dan-hill2802 in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/571
  • ci: Publish only if the workflow is not running on a fork by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/574
  • ci: Tweak concurrency group key by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/575
  • ci: Fix fork conditional by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/576

New Contributors

  • @vax-r made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/544
  • @heitorPB made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/511
  • @plantatorbob made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/551
  • @lolgopher made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/572
  • @henrybarreto made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/473
  • @dan-hill2802 made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/571

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.5.1...v5.6.0

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(alerting): Add gotify provider by @bugrakocabay in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/605
  • feat(alerting): Add AWS SES Alerting Provider by @beschoenen in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/579
  • feat(alerting): Make discord title customizable by @bugrakocabay in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/602
  • feat(alerting): Make authentication optional for email provider by @calvinhenderson in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/608
  • fix(alerting): add condition results to ntfy by @wei840222 in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/582
  • fix(alerting): Add support for client.insecure in email alerting provider by @mxcd in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/583
  • fix: Support hexadecimal integers in conditions by @heitorPB in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/563
  • docs: add instruction to install as binary by @bugrakocabay in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/615
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/miekg/dns from 1.1.55 to 1.1.56 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/578
  • chore(deps): bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/560
  • chore(deps): bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/567
  • chore(deps): bump docker/build-push-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/568
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from 2.46.0 to 2.49.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/584
  • chore(deps): bump modernc.org/sqlite from 1.24.0 to 1.26.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/585
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.16.0 to 1.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/586
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/wcharczuk/go-chart/v2 from 2.1.0 to 2.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/591
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/valyala/fasthttp from 1.49.0 to 1.50.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/594
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/coreos/go-oidc/v3 from 3.6.0 to 3.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/604
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.45.16 to 1.47.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/621
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go from 1.47.8 to 1.47.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/623

New Contributors

  • @mxcd made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/583
  • @beschoenen made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/579
  • @bugrakocabay made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/602
  • @calvinhenderson made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.6.0...v5.7.0

entry.title: New release for Gatus: v5.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(client): Add Google's Identity-Aware-Proxy in client config by @Kloox in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/600
  • feat(client): Add client network configuration for ICMP endpoint clients by @n-thumann in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/661
  • feat(http): enhance HTTP client configuration with proxy support by @appleboy in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/668
  • feat: add ability to delay startup by @vax-r in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/631
  • feat: shields.io endpoint badge by @buroa in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/652
  • fix(web): Allow configuration of read-buffer-size by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/675
  • fix: Allow binding IPv6 addresses for web by @n-thumann in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/650
  • build: refine Makefile targets and build command by @appleboy in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/666
  • refactor(alerting): Use pointer for receiver in AlertProvider.GetDefaultAlert method by @TwiN in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/676
  • docs(alerting): Fix wrong gitlab terminology (alert key vs. PAT) by @salim-b in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/694
  • chore(deps): bump actions/setup-go from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/634
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.14.0 to 0.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/649
  • chore(deps): bump modernc.org/sqlite from 1.26.0 to 1.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/654
  • chore(deps): bump codecov/codecov-action from 3.1.4 to 3.1.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/669
  • chore(deps): bump codecov/codecov-action from 3.1.6 to 4.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/671
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.17.0 to 1.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/658
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2 from 2.49.2 to 2.52.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/682
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/TwiN/deepmerge from 0.2.0 to 0.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/684
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.13.0 to 0.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/701

New Contributors

  • @Kloox made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/600
  • @n-thumann made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/650
  • @buroa made their first contribution in https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/pull/652

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TwiN/gatus/compare/v5.7.0...v5.8.0
